mapper.sql: UUID, TRAN_CODE, MSG_SEQ, REQUEST_TIME, RESPONSE_TIME, FLAG, STATUS, DIFF_CODE
mapper.insert: insert into H_FMT_CODE (UUID, TRAN_CODE, MSG_SEQ, REQUEST_TIME, RESPONSE_TIME, FLAG, STATUS, DIFF_CODE) values (#{uuid}, #{tranCode}, #{msgSeq}, #{requestTime}, #{responseTime},#{flag}, #{status}, #{diffCode})
mapper.select: select tran_code from h_fmt_code group by tran_code
